name: Pop Totem
description:
Jump and dash in this two buttons mobile puzzle platformer. Remove wrong tiles and try to recreate the original Animal Totem!
Carry on the tradition and learn the meaning of each one of them!
(The game is a .apk and you can install it only on mobile android devices)

 Follow me on twitter if you like my game @hav24  

Controls

(It's a mobile game)
- Dash button on the bottom left of the screen to Dash.
- Jump button on the bottom right to jump/double jump/wall jump.

Credits

All assets were made by me,  Alessandro Pezzetti aka havana24 8bit sound effects made with Bfxr and Freesound.
Background music by Melodyloops
Game made with Godot.

A game made by havana24.net Twitter @hav24
